scheduler.name: scx_rusty
scheduler.description: A production-ready multi-domain scheduler with intelligent load balancing. Creates separate scheduling domains per LLC with user-space load balancing. Features configurable thresholds, greedy task stealing, and support for both FIFO and priority-based scheduling within domains. Architecture-flexible design suitable for various CPU topologies.
scheduler.characteristics: multi domain support, per llc domains, user space load balancing, configurable thresholds, architecture flexibility, greedy task stealing, fifo mode support
scheduler.limitations: May not distinguish NUMA nodes well, potential infeasible weights issue
